revision.comment: Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/LordMisfit|LordMisfit]] ([[User talk:LordMisfit|talk]]) to last revision by [[User:Gez|Gez]]
revision.text: The '''TID''', or '''Thing ID''', is the [[tag]] of a thing. This identifier should not be confused with any of the other [[magic numbers]] that can refer to a [[thing]]: a same TID can be shared by several [[actor]]s of different [[classes]], and it does not correspond to one actor class in particular. [[Category:Glossary]]
